about.title: Biography
about.p1: At 21 years old, studying Computer Science (specializing in Secure Application Development) at IUT Montpellier-SÃ¨te, I am a technology enthusiast particularly drawn to cybersecurity challenges. For me, computer science is a discipline that combines technical rigor with a human dimension.
about.p2: Currently an Assistant Project Engineer at ITESOFT in Aimargues (30470) in hybrid mode, I dedicate my energy and skills to an innovative company in the software development sector. My goal is to continue my education by joining CNAM in Cybersecurity or Polytech Montpellier in DevOps, while continuing my apprenticeship at Itesoft. I aspire to evolve from the Project Delivery department to the IT Security department to align my apprenticeship with my training and develop expertise in cybersecurity, a field I am particularly passionate about.
about.p3: Actively involved for two years in the Student Bureau (BDE) as Event and Communication Manager, I have developed skills in project management, organizing federating events, and communication. This experience has allowed me to strengthen my interpersonal skills and my ability to lead initiatives from A to Z, illustrating my ability to reconcile technical rigor with interpersonal dynamism.
about.p4: Originally from the Var region and studying in Montpellier, my past practice of handball has instilled in me a strong team spirit and great perseverance, qualities I apply to overcome both technical and organizational challenges.
